ContactMessageEmail: <!DOCTYPE html><html lang='en'><head><meta charset='UTF-8'><meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width,initial-scale=1'><title>Document</title></head><body><table style='width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;font-size:16px;font-family:'Lucida Sans Unicode',sans-serif'><thead><tr><th style='width:15%'></th><th></th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style='background:#f3f5f7;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>Account Number:</td><td style='background:#f3f5f7;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>{0}</td></tr><tr><td style='background:#fff;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>Full Name</td><td style='background:#fff;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>{1}</td></tr><tr><td style='background:#f3f5f7;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>Company Name:</td><td style='background:#f3f5f7;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>{2}</td></tr><tr><td style='background:#fff;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>Email Address:</td><td style='background:#fff;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>{3}</td></tr><tr><td style='background:#f3f5f7;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>Phone No:</td><td style='background:#f3f5f7;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600'>{4}</td></tr><tr><td style='background:#fff;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600' rowspan='2'>Message:</td><td style='background:#fff;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid gray;font-weight:600' rowspan='4'>{5}</td></tr><tr><td></td><td></td></tr></tbody></table></body></html>
DistiRegToThankEMailBody:
Thank you {First Name} {Surname} for your Online Registration!


What happens next?

We are now going to follow a vetting process to make sure that you are registered with us.

Thereafter we will approve or decline your application to purchase on our Online Ordering System Platform.
An email will be sent to you shortly.


Regards
Esquire Online Team
WelcomeEMailText:
Dear {First Name} {Surname}

Thank you. Your registration on {Site URL} was successful!

Your password is {Password}, and can be changed at any time by clicking on the profile link after logging on.

Kind Regards

Esquire Online Store

STK#DESCRIPTIONPRICE EXCL.QTYTOTAL EXCL.TOTAL INCL.

Total : {5} Incl VAT


Thank You For Your Order

Please Note :
Orders placed from 15h00 will only be processed the next working day.
To confirm your order, please forward a proof of payment to reserve your items placed on order.
As our products are continuously moving out very fast, certain items may be Out-Of-Stock or may not be available any longer.

If this event does occur, we will furnish you with an estimated delivery date or a suitable alternative.

 


Please Note :
Use your Esquire account number or order number as your reference number when processing an EFT to allocate your payment more efficiently.

Please send proof of payment to:{BranchMail}

 


ABSA Bank

Account Number:

4053242883

Branch Code :630445

Account Name :Esquire System Technologies

 

 


FNB Bank

Account Number:

62025085847

Branch Code :252245

Account Name :Esquire System Technologies

 

 


Standard Bank

Account Number:

410284912

Branch Code :012645

Account Name :Esquire System Technologies

 

 


Nedbank

Account Number:

1497069041

Branch Code :149745

Account Name :Esquire System Technologies

 

 


Please use ONLY the ABSA Banking details if you are going to do any Cash Deposits: Please note that if you are going to do Cash Deposits into any OTHER bank (i.e. Standard, Nedbank or FNB)there will be a 1% Cash Deposit Fee charged to your account. All Stock will be only released once payment is reflected as cleared funds in our Banking Account. Please note that we have no control over the banking channels and there are instances where a same bank payment may be held over for 24hours (e.g. payment from one Standard Bank account to another Standard Bank account). In this instance stock will only be released the next working day provided it has cleared into our Banking Account.

AccountActivated:
Dear {title} {fname} {sname},
Welcome to Esquire’s Online Ordering System
Your Account Is Now Active!
Why You Will Love Ordering Online With Us:
  • Shop Our Entire Product Range, Anytime, Anywhere.
  • Live-Stock Availability — Updated In Almost Real Time.
  • Product Information , Specifications And Features At Your Fingertips.
  • Order Directly Into Our System — 24/7 Access.
  • One Account Number For To Use At Any Branch.
  • Choose Collection, Doorstep Delivery or Drop Shipping.
  • Pricelists Now Online — Log In To View And Download.
  • Free And Paid Versions Of The Datafeeds For Your Own Integration.
Start Shopping Now: esquire.co.za
Regards,
The Esquire Online Team
AccountDeactivated:
Dear {name}

 

Your account is now Deactivated

If you feel that this is not correct please contact us to rectify.

 

Regards

Esquire Online Team
OrderReceived:
Hi {title} {firstname} {surname},

 

Thank You For Placing Your Online Order. We would like to confirm that your order has been successfully received.
Please note that our system is currently undergoing scheduled maintenance or a routine backup, which may result in a slight delay in processing your order.
We appreciate your understanding and patience during this time.

 

Kind regards,

Esquire Online Team
